author: hwright
msg: Remove the 1.7.x-r1201824 branch, reintegrated in r1207351.

author: arkurth
msg: Updated a few subroutines in Windows.pm which normally return a hash or array to not return 0 if an error occurs. This will prevent the calling subroutine from generating "Can't use string ("0") as a HASH ref" errors.

author: hwright
msg: svn diff -c N on a file added in revision N is broken.
Not a regression from 1.6.x but backporting this fix is easy
because it needs no public API changes.
